types1:Item.types1:Name: TEMPLATE-MP-Job-Alerts-DB
types1:Item.types1:Description: Template for Main Job Processes version: 1.6

process.name: TEMPLATE-MP-Job-Alerts-DB
process.description: Template for Main Job Processes version: 1.6

parameter.description: Set to true for Synchronous invocation
parameter.name: in_wait_to_complete

parameter.description: Job Parameters, change the Type to a Custom Specific Process Object
parameter.name: in_parameters

operation.expression: let $pid := util:getProcessId() return if (empty($input.in_context)) then <ProcessExecutionContext> <parentProcessId>{$pid}</parentProcessId> <mainProcessId>{$pid}</mainProcessId> <jobId>{util:generateUUID()}</jobId> <orgId>{util:resolveURN('urn:environment:orgid')}</orgId> <baseURI>{util:resolveURN('ae:base-uri')}</baseURI> <environmentName>{util:resolveURN('urn:environment:name')}</environmentName> </ProcessExecutionContext> else <ProcessExecutionContext> <parentProcessId>{$pid}</parentProcessId> <mainProcessId>{$input.in_context[1]/mainProcessId}</mainProcessId> <jobId>{$input.in_context[1]/jobId}</jobId> <orgId>{util:resolveURN('urn:environment:orgid')}</orgId> <baseURI>{util:resolveURN('ae:base-uri')}</baseURI> <environmentName>{util:resolveURN('urn:environment:name')}</environmentName> </ProcessExecutionContext>

<CreateJobLogEventRequest> <event_message>Job Fault</event_message> <event_time>{current-dateTime()}</event_time> <event_detail>Error Code: {$output.faultInfo[1]/code} Error Reson: {$output.faultInfo[1]/reason} Error Detail: {$output.faultInfo[1]/detail}</event_detail> <process_id>{$output.out_context[1]/parentProcessId}</process_id> <logging_level>3</logging_level> <process_name>{$temp.tmp_process_name }</process_name> {$output.out_context } <process_title>{$temp.tmp_process_title}</process_title> </CreateJobLogEventRequest>
